emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Principal John Brewer Sr., holding hands of Darline Grimmett and Priscilla Thompson, walking out of Miller Elementary School into snow, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 24, 1962, pg. A1 reads: "Left to right, Darline Grimmett, John Brewer, principal of Miller Elementary School and Priscilla Thompson."
